attributes.action: consider the repercussions of unfairly taxing 4x4 drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IS IT ME OR HAS THE CHANCELOR and the general public gone mad. I am a hard working tax paying father of two that owns a 4x4.I paid a considerable amount of money for my vehicle including a massive amount of VAT to the Treasury when I purchased it. It is not a gas guzzling giant that we are led to believe, quite the contrary. Even if it was I would surely pay extra tax in fuel duty as we currently pay circa 80% tax to the tresury. Extra taxing on 4x4's just because they are 4x4's I feal is victimisation. If I owned a 10 year old unserviced banger spewing loads of co'2 and polution out, it seems that would be acceptable and not taxed appropriately. I petention the Government to consider the unfair taxation of 4x4's. There should be parity for all private cars. Why should we be  victimised just because we drive a 4x4 or sports cars. We pay more in the first place then have to pay extra over and above what other road users have to pay, is this a fair tax policy?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
